layout.footerText: Â© Copyright 2023. Made by Farhan Aziz

home.heroDescription: A Full Stack Developer crafting comprehensive web solutions by seamlessly integrating robust Frontend designs with powerful Backends
home.aboutSubHeading: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills mostly in terms of programming and technology
home.aboutDescription1: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer skilled in building complete web applications from start to finish. I develop both the front-end and back-end portions of web applications, working with both client-side and server-side technologies.
home.aboutDescription2: On the front-end, I create responsive and intuitive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript frameworks like React. I implement features that enhance the user experience and ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness for mobile devices.
home.aboutDescription3: On the back-end, I develop server, API and database components for functionality, security and data using Nextjs Server Actions and databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL. I integrate the front-end elements with the back-end through RESTful APIs.
home.aboutDescription4: I'm open to Job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience then don't hesitate to contact me.
home.projectsSubHeading: Here you will find some of the personal and clients projects that I created with each project containing its own case study
home.projects1Description: A platform e-commerce thrift shop that allows users to open their own online stores and upload used products to sell. There is a store panel for sellers to manage products. Buyers can view and checkout items from various stores.
home.contactSubHeading: Feel free to Contact me by submitting the form below and I will get back to you as soon as possible

CSProject.mainDescription: This page contains the case study of {project} project which includes the Project Overview, Tools Used and Live Links to the official product.
CSProject.thriftshopOverviewDescription:
Dopefolio is an Open-Source project which is a simple and clean multi-page portfolio website template for developers. I created this project for developers to quickly build a good-looking and fast-performing multi-page portfolio without having to code their portfolio from scratch.

Since the launch of this project, It has received more than 2k stars on Github and it has also got featured on hundreds of sites and CSS-tricks also featured this template as the hottest frontend tool of 2021 in one of their articles which you can find here

Dopefolio is now being used thousands of developers globally and it has helped many people in landing jobs & opportunities which makes me happy that my creation is helping other people in building their careers.

It has many other features like Dopefolio's repo contains a playground link which people can use to test the with different theme colours to find their own preferred primary colour for the template.

Feel free to check out the Project by visiting the Project Link.
